quest.name: Assistants Anonymous
journal: An Auri samurai is in need of an extra pair of eyes.
objectives: Stand watch at the designated location.
Stand watch at the designated location.
Obtain the crate of pilfered provisions.
Deliver the crate of pilfered provisions to the Auri samurai.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: Beg your pardons, but you are Forename, are you not? I have heard much and more of your valiant deeds. I would entreat your aid, if you are willing.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: I am due to meet with some of our informants. Under normal circumstances I would do so with my partner, but he was wounded in our last outing and is bedridden. As such, I have been seeking someone to accompany me in his stead.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: Though these informants are known to us and the risk is low, command forbids that we embark on missions alone. It would give me much heart to have one such as you join me.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: I am in your debt. Without further ado, then, let us make for Yuzuka Manor, where the first meeting will take place.

dialogue.name: NAMAZUO02804
dialogue.text: You wish to talk, do you? Sincerest apologies, but I am to talk to none but her, none at all.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are. I will speak with our informant. In the meantime, I ask that you keep watch for danger in the area.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: Pray keep watch for danger in the area while I speak with our informant.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text:
My thanks, Forename.
...Hm? I take it you are surprised that the informant was a Namazu.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: You see, arrogant as they are, the Garleans think the Namazu beneath their attention. He and his kind can get close to them without raising suspicion.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: Furthermore, as ubiquitous as they are, they make excellent eyes and ears both near and far. Just now, I was apprised of the situation in the lands neighboring Yanxia.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: But come, there is one more informant to meet, this time in Namai.

dialogue.name: ANXIETYMAN02804
dialogue.text: Aye? I don't stick my nose in others' business, and I'd thank others to keep theirs out o' mine.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: You are here. Good. As before, pray keep watch over the area while I speak with our informant.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: Pray keep watch over the area while I speak with our informant.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: Though he came attired as a local, that man is in fact a sympathizer in the imperial army. He brings us much-needed provisions as well as intelligence.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: And today, he tells us that a band of imperial defectors has taken to banditry in the region. Command will wish to hear of this.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: I will hasten ahead to the House of the Fierce. My apologies, but may I trouble you to transport this crate in my stead?

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: Again, my apologies for leaving you to do the heavy lifting. I shall take the provisions off your hands now.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: We are in your debt. Thanks to you, we were able to take swift action as regard the defector bandits. Even now, our scouts are keeping them under surveillance.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: And yet, bandits though they may be, they are not unlike usâ”€victims of imperial rule. Were they not forcibly conscripted, they could well be living peaceful lives.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: But the reality is there can be no peace under the Garleans, and full many are doing their part to bring about Doman liberation. Like the souls whom you met today. Like yourself.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02804
dialogue.text: Would that the bandits would join their strength to ours as well. Their help would be most welcome in our struggle.

obj.n: How Tataru Got Her Groove Back
